duties_responsibilities.duty: Make accurate decisions on assigned claims through proactive case management according to the plan provisions, state and federal guidelines, and established protocols.
Consult with other team members and the Professional Resource Team to assist claimants with return to work efforts when the capability and opportunity exist.
Administer claims within a variety of group sizes ranging from small (2+ lives) to large market (1000+ lives).
Ensure all plan provisions are met through the duration of the claim and consult with legal, investigative resources, and financial specialists.
Deliver timely and appropriate disability claim decisions while providing superior customer service to all internal and external customers.
Broaden and enhance the knowledge of complex claim handling.
Determine integrated income to ensure appropriate financial risk and accurate payments are made.

education_certification.credential: 4-year college degree preferred or equivalent work/education experience
